title: The directional short-time fractional Fourier transform of distributions
authors: Astrit Ferizi, Katerina Hadzi-Velkova Saneva, Snjezana Maksimovic
abstract:
We introduce the directional short-time fractional Fourier transform
(DSTFRFT) and prove an extended Parseval's identity and a reconstruction
formula for it. We also investigate the continuity of both the directional
short-time fractional Fourier transform and its synthesis operator on the
appropriate space of test functions. Using the obtained continuity results, we
develop a distributional framework for the DSTFRFT on the space of tempered
distributions $\mathcal{S}'(\mathbb{R}^n)$. We end the article with a
desingularization formula.
